com.innerspec.main

Class GerberFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.innerspec.main.GerberFileManager

  • public class GerberFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the creation and writing of Gerber file data.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GerberFileManager

        public GerberFileManager()

    • Method Detail

      • startWriting

        public static void startWriting()
        Starts process to create and write to Gerber files. Loops through all layers, calling createGerberFile() to create all unique Gerber files. Afterwards, searchAndWriteEntities() is called to write all entities to the files.

      • createGerberFile

        private static void createGerberFile(Layer layer)
        Creates a Gerber file for a layer or adds it to the file. Synchronizes the fileNum of the layer and Gerber file to which a layer belongs to.
        Parameters:
        layer - The layer of which a Gerber file will be created or added to.

      • searchAndWriteEntities

        private static void searchAndWriteEntities()
        Searches the dxf file for each entity (line, arc, or circle) and writes to a Gerber file using the startEntityWriting() method. Once a NullPointerException is thrown (reaching the end of the dxf file), the end code is written to all Gerber files.

      • addOtherEntity

        private static void addOtherEntity(java.lang.String name)

      • writeProgressOutput

        private static void writeProgressOutput()

      • getGerberFiles

        public static java.util.ArrayList getGerberFiles()

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getOtherEntities()

      • addEntityOutOfBounds

        public static void addEntityOutOfBounds(int entityType)
        Parameters:
        entityType - 0 for line, 1 for circle, and 2 for arc

      • addZeroLengthEntity

        public static void addZeroLengthEntity(int entityType)
